input.sentences: wednesday night is always dinner night with my friends .
in truth | we spend as much time at the bar as we do eating .
i try to take the subway to the restaurant to save a little money .
sometimes i even walk to the restaurant | but it takes about 35 minutes .
it 's a lot more fun than spending another evening in the office .
output.sentences: Sometimes it seems nothing will get you over a wednesday night at work like your office friends.
Truth is, it's nice to be able to spend time with good people inside and outside of work.
On break, we all decided to save time and catch the subway to this little hole in the wall restaurant that we've been talking about for weeks.
It was a nice day out and we snickered about select people as we walked to the restaurant.
Maybe the best part was spending time outside the office, maybe it was the good food--but I must say it was defnitely a good wednesday shift.
